latch-parameter1-entered: Information successfully sent. Now you can go to Preferences and Pair your Latch account!
latch-error-appid: App_ID field can't be empty or have extrange characters. Allowed characters are [0-9],[a-z],[A-Z].
latch-error-secret: Secret field can't be empty or have extrange characters. Allowed characters are [0-9],[a-z],[A-Z].
latch-error-pair: Pair token field can't be empty or have extrange characters. Allowed characters are [0-9],[a-z],[A-Z].
latch-desc: Adds a [[Special:LatchConf|special page]] to add a Latch protection to your account (need ''admin'' right)
latch-OTP-error: Wrong OTP, remember that you only have 3 attempts
default-error-pair: Latch pairing error: Cannot connect to the server.
206-pair: Pairing token not found or expired
